item.title: Install Kodi on Windows 10
item.author: Auteur
item.description: The new Windows is here, please follow our latest video in order to install Kodi on Windows 10. Install Kodi on Windows 10 This is pretty easy, as usual follow these few steps: Go to kodi.tv Downloads page; Download the required version; Install it by clicking “Next”; Run and enjoy! Or else… You could also check our Kodi Beginner’s Guide for more detailed and advanced setup.
